list_translation_mean.translate_mean: lổ để bỏ thơ vào thùng

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: the opening in the lower part of the human face, surrounded by the lips, through which food is taken in and from which speech and other sounds are emitted.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: Ben stood transfixed with disbelief, his mouth open
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Ben đứng bị hoài nghi với sự hoài nghi, miệng anh mở ra

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: an opening or entrance to a structure that is hollow, concave, or almost completely enclosed.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: standing before the mouth of a cave
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: đứng trước miệng một hang động

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: say (something dull or unoriginal), especially in a pompous or affected way.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: this clergyman mouths platitudes in breathy, soothing tones
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Giáo sĩ giáo sĩ này nói theo tinh thể trong hơi thở, êm dịu

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: take in or touch with the mouth.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: puppies may mouth each other's collars during play
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Chó con có thể miệng vòng cổ của nhau trong khi chơi
